page.title: 19BROOM HILL PARK
page.content: Broom Hill is a very popular park where people go to give their dogs a walk, and children to play on the slide and swings. Some junior schools have their Sports Day in the field and many older boys play football here too. Joggers also jog there in the morning and evening. You can easily notice, if you go there first thing in the morning that vandals have been there, because beer cans have been smashed up and trodden on as well as graffiti on the benches and ground. If you go to the top of the hill you can see a fascinating view. You can see all of Rochester including the Castle, Bridge, Cathedral and also Chatham Pentagon. It is a place where you go to think and have a bit of peace. By Tajinder Gill, Chapter School
